title: Updated Home with Large Yard in Prime Willows
posting_body: Updated home with spacious modern feel in the sought after Willows/ Palo Alto adjacent area.
Award winning Menlo Park school district; great location!
Just one block away from the new Laurel school campus!
Biking distance to Stanford campus and downtown Palo Alto
Three Bedrooms, two baths, Master bedroom with ensuite bathroom

Updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances and granite counter tops - open kitchen with flow into family room,  remodeled baths with beautifully tiled baths/showers and updated flooring, vanities, fixtures throughout.
Open kitchen/family room area flows to outdoor covered patio area great for lounging/BBQ area, mature trees, large lawn and fenced yard.
Separate bright and sunny living room with french doors,  washer/dryer,  new landscaping, and more... enjoy this remodeled home!
approx 7500 sq feet, interior approx 1500 sq ft. wonderful sunny, large enclosed yard/lawn, with paved patio area, mature landscaping, room for gardening.
2 car oversized garage with built-in storage, additional off street parking.
Great location, award winning Menlo Park schools, 1 block from Laurel/O'Connor school , nearby market, coffee shop, cafe, dry cleaner, spa.
Walk /bike to downtown Palo Alto, Stanford, close to Facebook, 101 central Silicon Valley and more!
Gardener provided by owner twice monthly.
One year lease minimum, longer preferred
